roulette.table

Class Table

  • java.lang.Object
    • roulette.table.Table

  • public class Table
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of the table in a game of roulette.
    Author:
    hyperion

    • Constructor Detail

      • Table

        public Table(int minimum,
     int limit)
        Creates a new Table object
        Parameters:
        minimum - The minimum of the table, i.e. the minimum amount a bet needs to possess to be valid at this table
        limit - The limit of the table, i.e. the maximum amount a bet may possess to be valid at this table

    • Method Detail

      • getMinimum

        public int getMinimum()
        Get the minimum amount for bets to be registered to the table
        Returns:
        The minimum amount of bets to be registered to the table

      • getLimit

        public int getLimit()
        Get the limit of the table, i.e. the maximum amount for bets
        Returns:
        The table limit

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid(Bet bet)
        Checks the validity of the indicated bet. The amount of the bet is checked with the table limit and minimum. Note: this should be changed to the sum of all bets from a single player, once the Player class has been implemented.
        Parameters:
        bet - Bet to be checked on validity
        Returns:
        True if the bet is valid, false if the bet is invalid

      • getBets

        public java.util.LinkedList<Bet> getBets()
        Returns all currently registered bets
        Returns:
        LinkedList of all currently registered bets

      • placeBet

        public void placeBet(Bet bet)
              throws InvalidBet
        Add the indicated bet to the table
        Parameters:
        bet - Bet to be added
        Throws:
        InvalidBet

      • removeBet

        public void removeBet(Bet bet)
        Removes the indicated bet from the table
        Parameters:
        bet - Bet to be removed
